Blocked_Browser_Main_Text: Scan the QR code to view on your device:
Bluetooth_Audio_Sync_Error: Audio sync failed.\nPlease try again later.
Bluetooth_Audio_Sync_Main_Text:
Hold headphones near
microphone on screen
and press start.
Audio will be muted
during the sync process.
Bluetooth_Visibility_Main_Text: Pairing new headphones?\nHeadphones must be in pairing mode.
Cancel_Download_Main_Text: Are you sure you want to\ncancel the download?
Connection_Assistant_Help_Text: Or press the power button below\nto open the quick menu.
Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_1_Main_Text: Scan the QR code to connect\nto the screen using Wi-Fi:
Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_2_SOP1_Help: Press the power button below and\nselect Wi-Fi to choose an available network.
Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_2_SOP1_Main: Ensure your device and this screen are on\nthe same Wi-Fi network to stream media.
Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_2_SOP1_Scan: Scan the QR code to connect:\n{0}
Connection_Assistant_QR_Code_2_SOP2_Main: Scan the QR code to connect\nto the app or for other ways\nto connect.
Crosslink_Host_Main_Text: A crosslink pairing process has been initiated.
Crosslink_Screen_Main_Text: Please select the side of the vehicle\nyou would like to assign to this screen.
Delete_Device_Main_Text: Are you sure you want to delete\nthis Bluetooth® device?
Delete_Install_Main_Text: Are you sure you want to\ndelete the software update?
Delete_Network_Main_Text: Are you sure you want\nto delete the network?
Download_Failed_Main_Text: Software download failed.\nWould you like to retry?
IVI_Delete_Confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete
{0}?
Note: audio output to car speakers
will no longer be available.
IVI_Main_Text:
Please select the screen as the Bluetooth®
audio source in the Infotainment system.
The maximum volume is determined by the
Infotainment system.
IVI_Sync_Error: An error has occurred.\nUnable to synchronize audio.\nPlease try again later.
IVI_Sync_Main_Text:
Select the screen as
Bluetooth® audio source
in the Infotainment
system. Reduce
background noise.
Press START when
the system is ready.
Install_Active_Main_Text:
Installing update
{0}% complete.

Please ensure the vehicle is switched on
until the update is completed.

The system will restart
once the install is complete.
Install_Available_Main_Text:
Software install available.
Would you like to install now?

During the update the system
will be inoperable.
Install_Delete_Main_Text:
Do you want to install or delete
the update?

During the update the system
will be inoperable.
Install_Failed_Main_Text: Software install failed.\nWould you like to retry?
Install_Successful_Main_Text:
Install successful. Software updated.

What’s new
- New/enhanced features
- General bug fixes
- Improvements to stability and security
Max_Volume_Notification: Screen volume set to maximum.\nIncrease your infotainment system volume.
Menu_Help_Crosslink:
Select <span id=\"text_Highlight\">CROSSLINK</span> to view content currently shown
on the companion screen. Note: if selecting crosslink
when audio sharing is active, audio and volume
controls are unavailable.
Menu_Help_HDMI:
Content from an HDMI source can be
played if a compatible device is connected.
If no content is played on the HDMI device
after it is selected, the screen
will appear blank.
Menu_Help_Input:
Select <span id=\"text_Highlight\">WI-FI</span> to connect to a wireless network.
This enables you to stream content through
external providers or to establish a connection
with your device to share content.
Menu_Help_Install:
To install the screen,
pull the collar on the mounting arm
and push the screen into the seat
until the seat holder clicks in place.
Menu_Help_Intro_SOP1:
The Audi Entertainment System allows
you to view content from a mobile device
connected through Wi-Fi or from a
compatible device connected
via HDMI or USB.
Menu_Help_Intro_SOP2:
The Audi Entertainment System allows
you to view and hear content from your
mobile device connected via Wi-Fi or
from a compatible device connected
via HDMI or USB.
Menu_Help_OTA: To discover the newest features and\nbug fixes, download the latest software\nfrom the settings menu.
Menu_Help_Output_SOP1:
Select <span id=\"text_Highlight\">BLUETOOTH</span> to connect
Bluetooth headphones.

Audio is also available through wired headphones.
Menu_Help_Output_SOP2:
Select <span id=\"text_Highlight\">BLUETOOTH</span> to connect Bluetooth headphones
or press the audio sharing button to
send audio output to the car speakers.
Audio is also available through wired headphones.
Menu_Help_Removal:
To remove the screen from the seat,
pull the collar on the mounting arm towards
the rear of the vehicle then pull the screen
until it is clear of the seat.
Menu_Help_Secure: To ensure the screen has located correctly,\npull gently to check that the screen holder is secure.
Menu_Help_Source:
Select <span id=\"text_Highlight\">SOURCE</span> to choose your desired content.
You can view content from external providers
by selecting the service from the list shown.
The browser can also be reset in this menu.
Menu_Help_USB: Media can be played through a compatible\ndevice connected via USB when using the\nFond Media Control app.
Notification_Temperature: Screen temperature too high. System will\nswitch off soon to avoid being damaged.
PIN_Entry_Main_Text: Please enter the PIN\nfor your Bluetooth® device.
Reset_Browser_Main_Text: Are you sure you want to reset the browser?\nAll account information will be lost\nand you will need to log in again.
Screen_Off_Notification: Please tap the screen to switch on
Software_Reset_Main_Text:
If you continue, the system will be reset
to the factory settings. All individual settings
such as saved networks or passwords
will be deleted. It is not possible to undo
this process. Are you sure you want to reset?
Software_Reset_Successful_Main_Text: Factory settings have been restored.\nSystem will restart shortly.
Update_Available_Main_Text:
Software update is available:
- New and/or enhanced features
- General bug fixes
- Improvements in stability and security
Version: {0} Size: {1} MB
Would you like to download it now?
Update_Unavailable_Main_Text: Unable to check for updates.\nPlease try again later.
Use_Extension_Main_Text_PL: The Audi Entertainment System\nwill shut down in {0} seconds.\nPress OK to extend use.
Use_Extension_Main_Text_SG: The Audi Entertainment System\nwill shut down in {0} seconds.\nPress OK to extend use.
